name: Turbo Island Purger
summary:
Become a professional Island Cleaner. Your job is to eliminate Rebellious Scrap. Each attempt to save the world presents a new randomly generated challenge: you will face number of unique robots - which you will choose yourself.

The atmospheric islands that you will be traversing will also be completely new - they are procedurally generated each time.

videos.title: Turbo Island Purger - Idle screen for Poznań Game Arena 2019
